official_title: Resolution expressing the sense of the House that optometric services be included in medical assistance programs.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that all medical assistance legislation provide for optometric services. Urges the States to continue such services whether or not they are included in any primary group of health care offerings.

titles.title: Resolution expressing the sense of the House that optometric services be included in medical assistance programs.
